pr_title: Issue #1405: Tests  for docker registry controller layer

timeline.bodyText: Let's add final here just in order to be consistent with all the new code.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: I suppose we can move such type reference to common constants utils class.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: The type could be extracted to the existing security creator utils class.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: It could be extracted even if there is only a single call now because it can be reused later.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Probably we can use more accurate test name such as shouldDownloadRegistryCertificate.
timeline.author: tcibinan

timeline.bodyText: Let's extract this downloading file parameters assertion to the abstract class. It definitely has a potential to be reused in other tests.
timeline.author: tcibinan
tcibinan
